column4: how can you talk about linux at all without resorting to acronyms? :)
while WTF is used to describe linux a lot (way too much, in my opinion), it's possible to replace that with other, more useful phrases :)
sure.. I was just talking about acronyms. :P
yeah, i get it. but WTF/noob, those kind of things are not in general alignment with the language rules (which I don't make)
